description: Monjirou is the ostrich that http://anidb.net/ch8584 [Ayane] is occasionally riding. Monjirou was hatched from the egg when Ayane was 5 years old and brought up by Ayane; now the bird lives in the family shrine together with the sisters Ayane and http://anidb.net/ch8583 [Machi]. Favorite food: chestnut jelly.
name: Monjirou
